item.title: Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood – PlayStation 3
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:9.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “GAME DISK ONLY! Every game we sell is GUARANTEED TO WORK! May have markings, discoloration, scratches, or other cosmetic flaws. This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 3 Rating: M – Mature Release Year: 2010 Genre: Action/Adventure MPN: 008888240174 Game Name: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood UPC: 008888240174 Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood (Sony PlayStation 3, 2010) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Soar across the rooftops of Rome in the award-winning Assassins Creed Brotherhood for PlayStation 3. Play as Ezio Auditore, an Italian assassin who must save the city of Rome from the Templar Order. This sequel to Assassins Creed 2 for PS3 allows the player to wield an exciting arsenal of weapons and machines during the lengthy 15-hour single player campaign. The loaded arsenal includes everything from parachutes and advanced flying machines to double hidden blades and poison darts. How you approach the mission is entirely up to you. What’s more, you get to interact with such historical figures as Caterina Sforza and Leonardo da Vinci during the Renaissance era. When not enjoying the adventurous single-player campaign, consider dabbling in the multiplayer portion of Assassins Creed Brotherhood, where you are given an expansive set of maps set around Rome and tasked with defeating other deadly assassins ranging from the executioner to the courtesan. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher Ubisoft Game Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood MPN BLUS-30537 UPC 008888240174, 008888346258 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 3 ESRB Rating M – Mature Genre Action, Adventure Location USA Tech Details ESRB Descriptor Blood, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Violence Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1-8 Release Year 2010 Game Special Features Explore the bustling areas of Rome in a single-player campaign spanning an estimated 15 hours in length Features a new class-based multiplayer component offering an assortment of game types Includes the following classes: executioner, courtesan, engineer, doctor, priest, prowler, and nobleman Game Series Assassin’s Creed Series View on eBay

The post Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood – PlayStation 3 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.

 Game Name: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood

Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood (Sony PlayStation 3, 2010) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Product Information
Soar across the rooftops of Rome in the award-winning Assassins Creed Brotherhood for PlayStation 3. Play as Ezio Auditore, an Italian assassin who must save the city of Rome from the Templar Order. This sequel to Assassins Creed 2 for PS3 allows the player to wield an exciting arsenal of weapons and machines during the lengthy 15-hour single player campaign. The loaded arsenal includes everything from parachutes and advanced flying machines to double hidden blades and poison darts. How you approach the mission is entirely up to you. What’s more, you get to interact with such historical figures as Caterina Sforza and Leonardo da Vinci during the Renaissance era. When not enjoying the adventurous single-player campaign, consider dabbling in the multiplayer portion of Assassins Creed Brotherhood, where you are given an expansive set of maps set around Rome and tasked with defeating other deadly assassins ranging from the executioner to the courtesan.
Product Highlights
Video


Product Identifiers
Publisher Ubisoft
Game Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood
MPN BLUS-30537
UPC 008888240174, 008888346258

Key Features
Platform Sony PlayStation 3
ESRB Rating M – Mature
Genre Action, Adventure
Location USA

Tech Details
ESRB Descriptor Blood, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Violence
Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick
Number of Players 1-8
Release Year 2010
Game Special Features

  • Explore the bustling areas of Rome in a single-player campaign spanning an estimated 15 hours in length
  • Features a new class-based multiplayer component offering an assortment of game types
  • Includes the following classes: executioner, courtesan, engineer, doctor, priest, prowler, and nobleman

    • Game Series Assassin’s Creed Series

item.title: South Park: The Stick of Truth – PlayStation 3
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:21.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “GAME DISK ONLY! Every game we sell is GUARANTEED TO WORK! May have markings, discoloration, scratches, or other cosmetic flaws. This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 3 Rating: M – Mature Release Year: 2014 Genre: Role Playing Sports Sub-Genre: RPG Game Name: South Park: The Stick of Truth MPN: 008888349051 UPC: 008888529057 South Park: The Stick of Truth (Sony PlayStation 3, 2014) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information The developer behind Neverwinter Nights 2 and Fallout: New Vegas uses its RPG expertise to lure the world’s most foul-mouthed elementary schoolers back to consoles in South Park: The Stick of Truth. Featuring a script and voice acting from series creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone, and designed to mimic the 2D cutout animation of the TV series, The Stick of Truth puts players in the role of a new kid in town who goes on an epic quest full of exploration and turn-based battles, all to earn status and become friends with Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny. The action mixes fantasy and role-playing tropes with trademark South Park humor as gamers battle ManBearPig, underpants gnomes, and hippies, among other scourges of society. Players can recruit classic series characters to join their party, each with unique weapons, armor, and magical skills. Characters can also be customized with hundreds of different weapon and clothing combinations. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher Ubisoft Game South Park: The Stick of Truth MPN 008888349051 UPC 008888529057 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 3 ESRB Rating M – Mature Genre RPG Location USA Tech Details ESRB Descriptor Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Mature Humor, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Violence Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1 Release Year 2014 Game Special Features Go on a journey full of foul language, cartoonish violence, and childish humor, all in an attempt to be cool Recruit popular South Park characters to help in classic turn-based battles against wily foes Customize characters with hundreds of different weapon and clothing options View on eBay

The post South Park: The Stick of Truth – PlayStation 3 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.

South Park: The Stick of Truth (Sony PlayStation 3, 2014) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Product Information
The developer behind Neverwinter Nights 2 and Fallout: New Vegas uses its RPG expertise to lure the world’s most foul-mouthed elementary schoolers back to consoles in South Park: The Stick of Truth. Featuring a script and voice acting from series creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone, and designed to mimic the 2D cutout animation of the TV series, The Stick of Truth puts players in the role of a new kid in town who goes on an epic quest full of exploration and turn-based battles, all to earn status and become friends with Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny.

The action mixes fantasy and role-playing tropes with trademark South Park humor as gamers battle ManBearPig, underpants gnomes, and hippies, among other scourges of society. Players can recruit classic series characters to join their party, each with unique weapons, armor, and magical skills. Characters can also be customized with hundreds of different weapon and clothing combinations.
